scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sookie
scrape.text:
A subdued and less psychotic version of Gone Girl with every character being manic in their own way. Its nothing like Good Fellas where they come together and eat food aftermath of disturbing turn of events.
This not some deep angst ridden tell all with dangerous minds with some deep rooted meaning. They are just fucked up people doing shitty things.
